body.ab: rigs pa'i dbang phyug chos kyi seng ges ¦ ri bong can gyi don spyi dang ¦ zla ba'i sgras brjod rung gi tshogs pa de ¦ ri bong can gyi don spyi zla ba'i sgras brjod rung gi tshogs pa 1du rtogs pa'i rjes dpag gi snang yul dang ¦ 'jug yul 2 ka yin zhes gsung ¦

rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i de kho na nyid rnam par 'byed pa legs par bshad pa'i gter mdzod ¦ blo gsal gyi yid la dga' ba gter ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ¦ gangs ri'i
khrod kyi rigs pa smra ba rnaMs kyi gtsug rgyan daM par gyur pa ¦ rigs pa smra ba'i btsun pa sangs rgyas bzang pos ¦ sbrang rtsi 'dzin pa'i dkar phyogs la ¦ mkhas grub °°i°i° du ma nye bar rten pa'i dben gnas ¦ broM pa rgyang gi gtsug lag bkhang chen por nye bar sbyar ba'o || .... good sayings that distinguish the essence/reality of what is correct and incorrect” was composed in the the great monastery/temple (/assembly hall) of Brom pa rgyang , which is a hermitage where many accomplished scholars reside, in the first part of the month of “the bee” (?), by the venerable logician Sangs rgyas bzang po, who is the excellent crown jewel of the logicians of the range of the snowy mountains.
